title: Why was i banned
body:
I dont understand how this is consider flaming why dont they actully ban those who flamed me they said why is their top fed i replyd with cuz jung gank all lanes but top.
this was not done by him i did it on his acc so. i got him perma banned the fact i even censored the only bad thing makes it even weirder.

replies.body: I know it doesn't seem like it, but using the chat in a way that looks like you're begging for reports or calling people "bronzie" might have been the main thing that got this actioned on. I'd consider reaching out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get their hard opinion on what happened here.
